# HuffmanCode
Compress and decompress text
# Project Overview
  
This is Huffman Encoding and Decoding program that can compress and decompress text using the Huffman encoding texhniques, unilizing concepts like proirity querte and binary search trees.

# Usage and Demo
- Run TurnTextToCode.java -
"this is a short input file composed entirely of spaces and lowercase letters
and end of line characters to help you test your code" 

Turns into....



- Run ConverCodeToText.java - 
The huffman code we see turns back to original sentence.
